comments.content: Just got the answer by (one of) the designer himself [K I S J U S T K](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055514/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/kisjustk), that's [Baron](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055514/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/gallery/BARON-%28Free-typefamily%29/9537663) by Frank Hemmekam.
